product_name: Eagle Creek Switchback 26 Wheeled Convertible Luggage - 26"
long_description: The Eagle Creek Switchback 26 wheeled convertible luggage is a study in travel versatility. With a removable daypack and interchangeable carry straps, you have multiple gear-carrying options.
short_description: The Eagle Creek Switchback 26 wheeled convertible luggage is a study in travel versatility. With a removable daypack and interchangeable carry straps, you have multiple gear-carrying options.
